Package org.jcvlib.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    VideoReader
    Interface for reading stream of images from different sources (from web-cameras, video file, network and etc.).
    VideoWriter
    Interface for writing images to video stream of different sources (video file, network and etc.).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Color
    This class contains all color values of some pixel.
    Image
    Main class for all images that used into the JcvLib.
    ImageArray
    Base class for all image arrays.
    ImageArray64F
    This type of image arrays contains values into float-point values and uses 64-bit for each value.
    ImageArray8I
    This type of arrays contains values into integer values and uses 8-bit for each value.
    JCV
    Contains common useful constants and methods.
    Point
    Contain (x, y) position on image.
    Rectangle
    Contain rectangle on image.
    Size
    Contain [height, width] size of image, rectangle or something else.
